channel.title: Toxo Invasion on Ward Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Toxo Invasion on Ward Lab

item.title: Toxoplasma Invasion 1
item.description: Invasion of a T. gondii tachyzoite into a human foreskin fibroblast. Note the constriction in the parasite’s plasma membrane that moves from anterior to posterior as the parasite penetrates past the host plasma membrane and into the developing parasitophorous vacuole. Real time; filmed at 35oC using a Dage VE1000SIT camera mounted on a Nikon Eclipse E400 microscope (Nomarski optics). The parasites are ~7um long.

item.title: Toxoplasma Invasion 3
item.description: Invasion of a T. gondii tachyzoite into a human foreskin fibroblast. Note the constriction in the parasiteâ€™s plasma membrane that moves from anterior to posterior as the parasite penetrates past the host plasma membrane and into the developing parasitophorous vacuole. Note also the migration of the internalized parasite to a perinuclear region, which begins with an abrupt “yank” on the parasite at ~1:23. Filmed at 35oC on a Zeiss Axiovert microscope (Nomarski optics). The parasites are ~7um long.
